$listeners.desc: All native events are being propagated (you don't need the '.native' modifier)

icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

caption.desc: Stepâ€™s additional information that appears beneath the title

done-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

done-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

active-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

active-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

error-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

error-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

error.desc: Mark the step as having an error

default.desc: The content of the step; Can also contain a QStepperNavigation if you want to handle step navigation and don't have a global navigation in place
